meanings.sent1: Before the trip, the teacher was predesignating the roles for each student.
meanings.sent2: The project manager is predesignating the tasks for the upcoming week.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be predesignating its favorite napping spot in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The wise old owl was predesignating the path to success for the young owlets.
meanings.sent5: By predesignating the meeting agenda, everyone knew what to expect.

meanings.definition: To specify or determine in advance
meanings.sent1: The chef was predesignating the ingredients needed for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The architect is predesignating the measurements for the new building.
meanings.sent3: The magician was predesignating the order of his tricks to create the best show.
meanings.sent4: The coach was predesignating the team strategy for the championship game.
meanings.sent5: By predesignating the rules, confusion was avoided during the game.
